conbody.p: The Storage Capacity Forecast panel predicts when a customer's aggregated used capacity will consume 80% of its total storage capacity. This prediction is based on the analysis of historic and forecast usage consumption.
You can sort the table in ascending or descending order, by clicking any of the two column headers.
Click All to open the table for all customers. In this table you can filter the data to find the desired information in a fast and easy way. Capacity forecast
